Screenwriter: Michael Kaycheck, Michael Oblowitz, Brooke Nasser
Production Co: Buffalo 8 Productions, BondIt Media Capital, Red Sea Media, Grindstone Entertainment Group
Synopsis: This gritty crime thriller starring Mel Gibson tells the tale of two narcotics agents hunting for a cop killer during a crack epidemic. Hoping for leads, Moran (Dominic Purcell, "Prison Break") and Thorton (Nick Stahl, Sin City) pay off a junkie informant. To provide for his wife (Kate Bosworth, Superman Returns) and son, Moran involves the stool pigeon in a deadly scheme. This causes the partners to come under the scrutiny of a suspicious internal affairs agent, leading to an explosive finale....
Title: Confidential Informant
